verses.roman:
tabe rūpa-gosāñira punar-āgamana
tāṅhāra hṛdaye kaila prabhu śakti-sañcāraṇa

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; rūpa-gosāñira—of Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; punaḥ-āgamana—again coming there; tāṅhāra—of him; hṛdaye—in the heart; kaila—did; prabhu—the Lord; śakti-sañcāraṇa—invoking of transcendental power.
translation: At Jagannātha Purī Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī met the Lord again, and the Lord invested his heart with all transcendental power.
